titles.title: Recognizing and commending the 100th Anniversary of the Augusta Metro Chamber of Commerce.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
1/29/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes the leaders and members of the Augusta Metro Chamber of Commerce for their 100 years of dedicated service to the economic development of Augusta, Georgia, and commends their efforts to ensure Augusta's continued competitiveness in domestic and global economies.
